title: Billie Eilish | Trump Praises Putin’s "Genius" and "Savvy" as Ukraine Crisis Worsens: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump praising Vladimir Putin's "savvy" and "genius" amid U.S. warnings of an imminent full-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine as Republicans and right-wing pundits claim President Biden is showing weakness.

Then, Billie Eilish talks about getting emotional playing Madison Square Garden, the signs her fans bring to concerts and returning to live concerts.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
